attributes.action: Review the TSG (Territorial Support Group) division of MET Police.
attributes.additional_details: We have reached out to MET Police and are yet to hear about changes or strategies to help aid better policing in our communities.
attributes.background: The community are urging for the government to review the TSG division of MET Police. They are continuously deployed into communities they have little to no knowledge or experience in and have displayed countless amounts of ignorance whilst policing. We want transparency when it comes to our police.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for the Met Police and the Mayor’s Office for Policing and Crime (MOPAC).

You can petition the Mayor's Office directly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
